I recently purchased portal 2 with discount  for  only EUR 0.8 in 2019. And i have to say it is the best game that money can buy for less than 1 EUR . Although this game was released many years ago , it's fantastic story and the fantastic gameplay of first-person puzzle solving that challenged you without being unreasonable and makes you to think out of the box , it still is an unique experience that no other game can give you .

This is the greatest game I have ever played 10/10 would potato again.

This game is still the bomb. Just started playing it again with a friend and can't emphasize enough how awesome it is. The graphics still hold up and the mechanics are incredibly fluid and well designed. Both co-op and single campaign is amazing and well worth the price.

Portal 2 is a game that has affected me profoundly. When I was a child, it came to me during my sleep and healed my body of it's wounds.

To be completely serious, though. Portal 2 is an extremely amazing game that is extremely worth it's tiny price during the summer sale.
An all time classic, provides hours upon hours of gameplay, and even more so now with the community maps.  One of the best games I have ever played.

I've played this game at least 15 times through on xbox, and another 10 on PC, and it never gets old. 

The game has an intriguing story, beautiful graphics, and fun puzzle mechanics that combine story and challenge really well. Not only that, but the Portal fan community is pretty big, giving fans more than just the games to enjoy and explore.

Can't recommend this enough! (Though waiting for steam sales and buying the bundle pack will save you a lot of money, it's still worth full price!)
